final_answer:
The humor in this image comes from the juxtaposition and contradiction of the two scenes.

On the left side, seeds are being carelessly discarded into a trash bin, even though pumpkin seeds are edible and often enjoyed as a snack. Meanwhile, on the right side, a person is eating pumpkin seeds from a commercially labeled packet. This suggests the irony of people often discarding perfectly good natural food, only to buy the same product in a packaged form. The text "YES, BUT" emphasizes this contradiction, making the viewer recognize the absurdity of the situation.
